SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BadRadiusValue
Exception thrown when a circle's radius value is invalid (e.g., non-positive).
Circle
Represents a drawable circle shape in a vector graphics editor.
CircleFactory
Factory class for creating instances of Circle.
EditorException
Base exception class for errors related to shape editing operations.
EditorFrame
Main application window for the vector graphics editor.
EditorPanel
Panel responsible for rendering and editing vector shapes.
EditorPanel.Mode
Modes supported by the editor panel.
LoadState
A task that loads a serialized list of VectorialObject instances from a file and updates the associated EditorPanel with the loaded data.
Movable
Interface representing objects that can be moved in 2D space.
Rectangle
Represents a drawable rectangle shape with optional rounded corners.
RectangleFactory
Factory class for creating instances of Rectangle.
SaveState
A task that saves a list of VectorialObject instances to a file.
ShapeFactory
Interface defining a factory for creating VectorialObject instances.
ShapeMath
Interface defining mathematical operations for shapes.
SidebarPanel
Sidebar panel providing UI controls for shape drawing and color selection.
Transformable
Interface for objects that can be transformed.
VectorialObject
Represents the base object class for all shapes
